sources.title: Enoteca Del Re - Review - Chinatown - Los Angeles
sources.content: Chinatown's Blossom Plaza is now home to a small wine bar pouring Italian wines under the strings of red lanterns. The solid happy hour deals and adjacent Metro stop could make Enoteca Del Re a convenient spot to grab a glass of nebbiolo post-work, plus there's a short menu of charcuterie plates, sandwiches, and pizzas to pick at. We haven't been here yet, but want you to know this spot exists.
